::: {.text-column}

I'm originally from **Seattle, Washington**, and I'm **24 years old**.  

I studied **Abstract Mathematics** and **Chinese Studies** at **Clemson University** in Clemson, SC, graduating in **December 2023**.  

After graduation, I moved to **San Antonio, Texas** to take my current job as a **Management Analyst** for the **Air Force Manpower Analysis Agency**.  

I really love my job because I get to **travel a lot** — this past spring, I even spent **two weeks in South Korea!** ✈️  

---

### Hobbies & Interests
- 🧶 Knitting  
- 🧗‍♀️ Rock climbing  
- 🏈 Watching football  
- 🎵 Country music  
- 📚 Reading  
- 🏄‍♀️ Wakesurfing

In my free time, you can usually find me **cheering on the Seattle Seahawks** while knitting a gift that's probably **three months late**. 😅  

A fun fact about me, is that I scored a **1** on the Putnam Exam.

:::
